website_summaries.verdict: An affordable pair of aviators that are available in a variety of colors with an impressive guarantee.
pros: A classic aviator style that comes in several colors
Metal construction has a lightweight feel and is comfortable on the face
cons: Lenses produce a bit of glare in some situations, and have been known to pop out of the frames

customer_reviews.title: Broken from the start?
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: The seller was quick to remedy the broken product by replacing it for me at no cost. I am very thankful for the speedy and excellent customer service and look forward to wearing these glasses! ORIGINAL: Inside these looked almost entirely gold, but when I wore them in the sunlight I could see more of the pink. I certainly like how they look. However, today I put them on to wear for the first time and noticed that one of the nose protectors is missing. Not fun.
customer_reviews.author: Cragsr

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels great. Free bag and cleaning cloth.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and fit if the silver pair I got. Light weight comfortable and the shade is just right not too dark and enough to protect my eyes from squinting in bright sunlight. It came with a nice bag and lens cleaning clothes with the purchase!!!!!! The right hinge is a little stiff. But I can live with that since it just stays on my face the whole time. AND doubles as an extra strength clip on my shirt. Will be looking to get another pair and look.
customer_reviews.author: vinh

customer_reviews.title: Cool glasses, great price
customer_reviews.text: These are your basic all black aviators, standard size. They are super sleek and minimal, just the right touch for any look! One thing to note--the side bars are made of very thin metal, so you'll have to be pretty careful not to bend the sides. Sojos always makes it so easy to care for their glasses, though-- they pack their glasses with a microfiber wipe for the lenses, a microfiber drawstring pouch for storage, and promotional goodies! Love this brand! If you're looking for a great value for the price, you've found them.
customer_reviews.author: Cara O.

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: These came just as I expected! They fit great on my face. I love the classic aviator style, but it's hard to find good quality sunglasses on a budget sometimes. I love how dark they are! You definitely can't see my eyes when I have them on (which I love and my main reason for purchasing the black lens). The polarized is very cool - just took me some getting used to as that I've never worn polarized before now. Reading my cell phone with them on was the hardest to get used to. They are very "plain" and simple, classic. They feel sturdy and durable. Will be ordering more colors!
customer_reviews.author: thewoodsnest

customer_reviews.title: The appearance of these glasses WOW
customer_reviews.text: I'm super impressed with my over sized mirrored glasses, as well as a pair of black lens with a black frame I think are my favorite so far from Sojosvision. They have an over abundance of many different colored lens as well as different colored frames. If your looking for any color I am positive your gonna find a few which makes it definitely a challenge to just pick one pair. Their prices are very affordable and with so many styles and colors that's a great thing! They're delivered in a box. Inside are the sunglasses which are wrapped in tissue paper for added protection. Included is a draw string pouch, and a large lens cleaning cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Fisher Wisor

customer_reviews.title: Polarized and trendy
customer_reviews.text: Love that they are polarized great quality for the price I will but again because I seem to break lots of glasses
customer_reviews.author: Can1love Top Contributor: Sunglasses

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price! I have 3 Pairs from sojos and I always get compliments because the my look more expensive then they are as seen on Instagram @thesmalltownblonde
customer_reviews.author: Owen Fam

customer_reviews.title: Excellent  product highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: So far they hold up very well they look absolutely awesome love the mirror tint. Can't beat these for the price and being polarized they're much more stylish and better priced than the Walmart glasses these definitely seem higher quality and hold up very well the Metal Frames are extremely sturdy and they're very very comfortable will definitely be purchasing another pair for my husband. Unfortunately I have a very small narrow face and these were way too big they were about a half an inch wider than my face on both sides I wish they made a smaller size I had to return my pair...
customer_reviews.author: Katie R.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish aviators
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a generic Rayban Aviator pair of glasses for everyday use.I lose or misplace sunglasses each year and replacing them with the name brand gets expensive.They are stylish and appear well made. They are gold wire, lightweight, and appear durable. I have had them for 3 weeks and can't comment on long term durability.They come with a drawstring bag and cleaning cloth. Would have preferred a lightweight slipcase since wire frames can deform with pressure. Mine didn't have noticeable mirroring. As a microscopist, I checked the the degree of of polarization and found it to be weak. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tony5020

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased to say they are sturdy and fit me perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I'm normally hesitant to buy sunglasses online because you never can be sure what you're going to get. My head is a little bigger than average...will the frames be too small? Will they actually shade my eyes from the sun? I'm very pleased to say they are sturdy and fit me perfectly, and the sun is no longer a problem on bright days. The price is right, and a few people have already asked where they can get a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrod

customer_reviews.title: My 3rd Pair of Sojos
customer_reviews.text: My 3rd pair of Sojos! I love this brand for well made and budget friendly sunglasses. I chose the Pink Mirrored with gold frame sunglasses. These are beyond beautiful. Well made, and protect my eyes as expected. The glasses are lightweight enough that they’re not bothersome on your ears or nose. Fitting my face well. Glasses arrive packaged well inside a box. Also a nice soft drawstring case for keeping. Polishing cloth inside it’s own envelope style pouch. I’m very pleased with my purchase and do highly recommend this brand for nice quality that won’t break the bank. Thank you for reading my review. If you’ve found it helpful, please click below so I’ll know. Meanwhile, Happy Shopping
customer_reviews.author: MissKelly

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses aren't bad for the price. Good to have as back ups. They are very light and you can wear them all day with out your nose hurting. They are plastic lenses so don't think for a minute they won't scratch. Take care of them and they will last. The only reason I gave them 4 stars is because I ordered two pairs and both had bent nose pieces. I adjusted them and they are fine now. If you want some inexpensive polarized sunglasses. Try them.
customer_reviews.author: dfresh

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Value!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two pairs of SOJOS - one was the classic aviators and upon arrival, they came in a box with a poly holder and cleaning cloth. Packaged well and upon putting them on first thing I noticed how lightweight they were! Also, they are polarized lenses even though they are lightly tinted. They provide great sun shield while I drive and am outside. As for looks, I honestly can't tell a huge difference from my much-higher priced RayBan aviators. I love everything about these sunglasses and look forward to wearing them often!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Starbuck

customer_reviews.title: Glasses look sweet, but I wish they were a little more ...
customer_reviews.text: Glasses look sweet, but I wish they were a little more purple. They are polarized, and I verified with pair of polarized glasses that I already own. You turn them 90° from each other and there's a blackout between them. These glasses scratch a little too easily, however; I wish there was better quality on the lenses. They are cheap, so not too difficult to replace once they get scratched up.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 3 more pair
customer_reviews.text: I really like these sunglasses. I ordered the first pair thinking.. well if they are not great it’s ok they cost like 13.00. Well they did surpass my expectations. Now I have some Costa’s that are great for UV protection for your eyes, and I have to say these are pretty good. I’ve had mine for several months and decided to order 3 more pair in different colors. I was meant to order blue, green and pink but ended up with blue, blue and pink. Oh well they are for gifts anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: So lightweight and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived so fast! Honestly, I wasn’t expecting much for the price but these were packaged so nicely, came with a soft bag and large cleaning cloth. I can’t believe they are polarized for this price! So light weight it doesn’t feel like I’m wearing anything. I have kids so sunglasses go missing all the time. This is the perfect price point for me and they are super cute for the price! EDITED TO ADD that I loved these so much that I bought a second all black pair for my husband. They have held up beautifully... I might steal them! Lol
customer_reviews.author: RDyers

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to Ray-Bans
customer_reviews.text: These sunnies are beautiful and looks better than my Ray-Bans. They are super light, comfortable, and the polarized lenses really does help seeing more in bright driving conditions. The only con I have, and why I took a star off, is that the hinges are so stiff - it makes it very hard to fold the stems in all the way and almost doesn’t fit my car’s sunglasses holder. It also feels like it’s gonna break off if I force it. Other than that, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Arbey26

customer_reviews.title: Good enough...
customer_reviews.text: I got these to replace a pair of Ray Bans that now live at the bottom of a lake :(. The second you pick these up you can tell they aren't anywhere near the same quality, they are really light and flimsy feeling. They also will light in from the sides and reflect it back into your eyes sometimes. But at less than 10% the cost of a new pair of Ray Bans, these will suffice for now, until I decide what I want to really replace my old glasses with, at which time these will be the glasses I take out on the water next time.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Nice aviators for the price
customer_reviews.text: These aviators were exactly what I was looking for. I like sunglasses that have a mirror coating that you can't see eyeballs behind and that's what I got with these sunglasses. The frames were straight and and came with a soft cloth case that you can use to clean the lenses. I don't wear them all the time (I like the look but I prefer a pair of glasses that have a wider arm to help block sunlight from coming in the corner of my eye. I like the look and function of these glasses though
customer_reviews.author: Landlord

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy....photos are deceiving.
customer_reviews.text: Was very unhappy to see that these sunglasses were not as pink as they are featured in this photo. They also feel like they are very cheaply made. When looking to return the product I was surprised to see that is not an option. So now I’m stuck with a pair of poorly made sunglasses that don’t look like the picture. Extremely disappointed. I would not recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best true polarized glasses out there.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight,very well built look and perform great!! They don't have you seeing things in a "weird" color like most glasses...just a nice soft dimming,so you can see well thru them,yet they work amazingly well!!! The polarization is awesome,really helps when the sun is glaring. Add in the fact they look stylish,and these are a winner!! Seriously...they look,perform and are built like glasses costing over $100.
customer_reviews.author: Barneys

customer_reviews.title: Crooked glasses
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are beautiful, the polarization is great, especially for my sensitive eyes... But why would anyone mail these in a bubble mailer? They are sooo bent up! I’m annoyed at how crooked they are. They aren’t in the soft protective case, the box is slightly crushed and the bubble envelope did nothing to protect them. Tho they are great quality, I think someone should re-evaluate the way they are mailed to protect them a little better.
customer_reviews.author: V. Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Superb quality and very stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I only wear Aviatior glasses and wanted to see what the polarized difference was. Wonderful lens, no glare. They arrived super quick. I accidentally sat on them and completely made it flat. I was scared to bend them back thinking I would break them (but had to try since I had just recieved them 2hrs earlier) Amazingly they bent back with no problems. Superb quality!! If you love aviators then these are a must. Will be buying every color.
customer_reviews.author: Megatron

customer_reviews.title: Size More Suited For The Ladies,But Great Customer Service !
customer_reviews.text: Too small for us fellas and no spring hinges ! There's no question about it theses are made for the ladies and children. I do give the maker five stars for customer service as my money was refunded cheerfully ! If these glasses fit you and in the future you have a problem I bet you too will get great customer service. Happy Trails Always, Oatsburner
customer_reviews.author: Oatsburner J. Mule

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: These are light weight, reasonably priced, and are polarized so they really protect the eyes. It comes with a small card that reveals a symbol that can only be detected with polarized lenses. This was a gift for my husband and he discovered some of his other sunglasses weren't polarized when using that card, the symbol would not be visible--so he threw those sunglass away.
customer_reviews.author: Carter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shades! Lightweight but durable
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I have bought a few pair for traveling. They are wire rimmed and I don’t take care of my glasses really well so they have bent some. They easily bend back into place. They are polarized and come with a testing strip. I thought that was cool. They fit really well with a hat. The perfect size in my opinion. I have swam in mine before and never had an issue. Sojos are my fave brand. Follow me on IG @thelizdoyle for more must haves.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Doyle Beauty

customer_reviews.title: These have polarized lenses
customer_reviews.text: WOW. I cannot stress this enough. These are the best sunglasses you can buy for your money. Not only do these come with a microfiber lens cleaner. But they also come with a polarized filter test THAT SHOWS YOU that these are 100% protecting your eyes. Never have I seen such great care put into packaging an item, and the box itself along with bag shows that these are meant to last. The build of the sunglasses are amazing, most sunglasses I have bought have tiny bends at the bridge of the glasses that cause discomfort. But these are perfectly symmetrical and fit amazingly.
customer_reviews.author: Iceics

customer_reviews.title: Nice at first but scratch very easily
customer_reviews.text: These were nice glasses at first, but they scratch very easily. After just over a month, much of the mirror finish is worn away and the glasses now look cheap and tacky. It's too late to return them for a refund, so I guess I'm stuck. If you just want something that looks nice for a weekend, these are fine, but I can't recommend them for long term wear.
customer_reviews.author: ideas

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: The reflective lenses seems to have a blue-ish tint to them even though I ordered the silver ones. However they are very nice! Opening this package, you would think these were $600 glasses! They come with th box, a pouch and cleaning cloth along with a Polarized testing board to ensure they are polarized. For the money, and the fact that these will serve as my "dressing out" glasses, I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: Wish these were not polarized.
customer_reviews.text: These were very comfortable to wear but awful to look through them. The polarized lenses distort your view, and some things appear to flash, which makes it very difficult for driving or even hanging out by the water. Super disappointed since they’re very cute and the quality of the frames feels really nice. Wish they were not polarized, and I would have kept them. Returned for something else better suited for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: A REMARKABLE VALUE
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are a REMARKABLE VALUE! I am not impressed easily. They are actually polarized lenses hard to find in this price range. I would rate these higher if that was an option. I have already ordered twice. I do recommend to anyone not willing to spend $200 for a pair of Wayfarers I would lose or sit upon within a yr.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D.

customer_reviews.title: Beats my Ray Ban
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! I have a square face that has low bridge nose which in combination makes it extra difficult to find a nice pair of sunglasses that would look nice. I tend to go for oversized as it helps make my face look a little smaller; one that I do not have to constantly have to keep pushing up on my nearly non existing bridge of a nose. This particular pair is perfect as it is very light; it stays put where I want them; perfect size for my square face; and the best part is the price. Will definitely buy another pair in the near future👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Not the best quality but you don't always need great quality at $200+ when you are purchasing trendy items! For the money this is perfect and look amazing and they are polarized! I have many designer glasses that I bought for classic looks. You can't go wrong with these aviators for the money and adding to a collection of sunglassss. My 2nd pair I purchased and will buy more styles because trendy is fun!
customer_reviews.author: Shellaticam

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight/ do not get the lenses wet!
customer_reviews.text: For your money just buy them! They are so light weight you don’t even know they are on your face. I’m a costa owner and I have to say these are great. They aren’t costas but they are of quality. Great look too. Update: do not get these wet! We spent the day by the pool and they got a few splashes and the coating starts coming off!
customer_reviews.author: Jodie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap feeling overpriced sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: This sunglasses are really low end. When you hold them and wear them, it’s obvious that it is inferior quality. I have bought other sunglasses around the same price range but have gotten good solid feeling items. This unfortunately should only be $5-6 dollars max. Find another pair. These are only good on their page and not in real life. 2 stars because it’s packaged nicely and is polarized
customer_reviews.author: S K

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of cheap glasses
customer_reviews.text: I break a pair sunglasses on nearly every trip I go on....it has almost gotten comical. Due to this, I cant afford to buy high end glasses. I look for cheap pairs to get me through. These are comfortable, light and sure to be broken due to my incompetence soon. That is why cost is so important....and these are a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Family

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this brand of sunglasses!! I just made my second purchase from them. One in rainbow, one in black. Their both super stylist, cute and durable. I haven’t found any issues. I get compliments constantly. Their cheap but don’t look it and my personal opinion is they should be more for how great they are!
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Rawahneh

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and affordable
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are perfect! They fit my face nicely and they are definitely have UV protection. They also come with a polarized tester card as well. These look exactly like a pair of designer shades that I have for half the price! Definitely worth the purchase! The cloth bag and glasses wipe is of good quality as well 😎
customer_reviews.author: Monica Ayee.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and cute
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are perfect and just what I wanted. They are not so dark while wearing that it is hard to see. They are extremely lightweight. I’ve had other sunglasses cause headaches from their weight but don’t do do that. They are so cute on and the price tag is great! I was gifted these sunglasses for my review by my opinions are unbiased and my own.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are great I have real exp ray bans,randolph maui jims and i have to tell you these are not far behind for a fraction of the price Best 13 dollers i ever spent snd will wear as knock arounds because i cant aford to lose the others Buy them you wont be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Dee dee

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice replica aviators
customer_reviews.text: For the price at the fraction of original Rayban aviator sunglasses, these are an awesome deal. The only thing that kept me from giving it five stars is it doesn't seem to be really polarized, it's extremely dark right off the bat, so it would have to be taken off right away when you go indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Eng

customer_reviews.title: They’re his favorite :)
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my husband to put in his Christmas stocking and he wore them every day until he lost them on a family trip...I had to order him the exact same ones for him to love his sunglasses again :) He said the arms stay stiff and don’t flop around like some do. It was a good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the cheap price
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the cheap price. Wasn't expecting anything like my Ray Bans so yes, they are thin, but fit great and I like the dark shade. Arrived on time. I like how it still comes with a case and cleaning cloth for the price. Good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Quality!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Is super cheap material and flimsy, doesn’t close all the way and is overall bad quality. I know it’s $13 but usually for that price I’ve been able to get quality sunglasses on Amazon. I’m pretty disappointed. It feels like a dollar store product to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: Husayn Imrani

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Literally so amazing. The glasses are both mirrored and polarized, as well as UV protected, and the black on black looks totally awesome. They seem to be well-made and sturdy, without feeling bulky or being super expensive. I think these are some of the best sunglasses you can get for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Courtnic2Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes you get what you pay for. Sunglasses are functional and look ok but do feel cheap. I buy inexpensive sunglasses all the time due to always losing them. These are probably one of the more cheaply feeling inexpensive sunglasses I’ve bought in awhile. They work for the money spent though.
customer_reviews.author: Dan G

customer_reviews.title: We love them!
customer_reviews.text: We loved these sunglasses, so much fun. Ordering other pairs for gifts. Everyone wants to test the polarization of the sunglasses. couldn’t be happier with them. The blue color was slightly darker than I thought I would be with less of a silver tone to the mirror, but probably different in certain lightings. All in all everyone was happy. 👍🏻 Also loved the slip in case.
customer_reviews.author: ZS.Bfarm

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Based on the pictures I was expecting something better. These look good from far far away but if you're a few feet away you can tell they are very low quality. They feel very light and weak so I will be returning them because they will break for sure the first time I drop them.
customer_reviews.author: Ubaldo Huerta

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I loose or break all my sunglasses, so I've stopped buy in NY expensive ones. These are very sturdy and look great! You cannot beat the classic aviator look. Great for any outfit or beach outting. Protects your eyes from harmful sun Ray's. I got the silver and I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Boog

customer_reviews.title: The lenses are nice but the fit of the sunglasses is killing my ear
customer_reviews.text: The bar that goes over the ear is really uncomfortable and painful after about 15 mins for me. They are nicely polarized and lightweight though. Update: I was contacted by the company who suggested that it was a defect in this particular pair. Otherwise as i have stated in the original review the polarization is great and so is the uv peotection(hopefully). They did offer a refund without me asking or even contacting them, and were very polite to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Nice but see through
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but feels delicate/cheap. Came in a little later than it said it would, but given everything going on that's expected. Seems to do the job, but the lens are pretty see through just ever so slightly tinted which was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: ScreamingPanda

customer_reviews.title: Great! but...
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived and I’m very happy with them. However, I personally like lightweight sunglasses that don’t set heavy on my face and these are VERY lightweight and the frame is very thin. So if you are worried about your glasses being too thin and fragile then I wouldn’t recommend them to you. But I am really happy with them and love the color and the sleeve to store them in is a great added bonus
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great.
customer_reviews.text: They're not horrible, but they feel and look as cheap as they are. I ended up spending a little more to get something a bit nicer. Only tired this out to replace a lost pair of sunglasses. Might look better on a woman instead of a man.
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but with flaws
customer_reviews.text: I loved the sunglasses and it lasted for several weeks but today the lens popped straight out of the frame. It was seriously on my face and the lens popped out. A little embarrassing but the unfortunate part is that they were my favorite pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tight ear wrap arounds
customer_reviews.text: The wrap around for the ears are so tight that they are almost impossible to wear. The originals were much more flexible.
customer_reviews.author: francis c. jackson

customer_reviews.title: Purple tinge
customer_reviews.text: They're not bad glasses, in fact they look really cool on and they feel sturdy. The only issue I have with them is that I see purple rainbow tinge everytime I look at something that has a glare or looking into my rearview mirror (seen in picture)-- I got the purple lenses. It can be kind of distracting when I'm driving. I also have never owned polarized glasses, so I don't know if this is a thing. Other than that they're great glasses they don't bend easy and they fit my face really well.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: A bit flimsy but very attractive. No case.
customer_reviews.text: These look as good as in the picture. I knocked off one star because after I received them, I realized that I will need a hard case for them, and it won’t be easy to find because the frames are huge. I wanted to knock off 2 stars, but I couldn’t bring myself to, because they are inexpensive, so ya get what you pay for. BUT! They aren’t very sturdy and will bend or break EASILY without a hard case to keep them in.
customer_reviews.author: TheCastillo6

customer_reviews.title: Get You A Pair Now!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Get these you won’t regret it. I got the silver frame with silver mirrored lenses. Nice quality and are the perfect size for my face. And these are polarized!! Came with 2 cleaning clothes and a little tester for the polarized feature.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlynn

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: These aviators are very nice, they look good, have a nice build quality, and work on the road. But when your in the air I would say purchase a higher priced item, the lenses only have so much capability, I find myself taking them off and just pulling over the sun-shield for better visibility.
customer_reviews.author: Geschwindigkeitsband

customer_reviews.title: Another wear and return scam.
customer_reviews.text: I really want to like these but they came looking like someone returned them already and were bent. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dee R

customer_reviews.title: Best aviators for the money
customer_reviews.text: For the money, you can’t beat these glasses. They have a sleek design. Just the right lens size. Lightweight. And I think they come with polarized lenses. Gas station glasses cost more than these and are of a fraction of the quality. You wont be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew C Garza

customer_reviews.title: good quality!
customer_reviews.text: haven't had em for too long but they don't seem flimsy and the lens is a good quality ( usually see like a rainbow glare through the lens with cheap sunglasses) i would think they would be more than the $12+ i paid for em. Very comfortable and they get super close to my eyes without messing up my falsies. Shipping was next day and the packaging was nice. The cleaning cloth and the storage bag are super soft and i definitely feel comfortable using them on my regular glasses. I will be buying more glasses from Sojos.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for?
customer_reviews.text: Let's be straight here. These are no RayBans. But, if you want a pair of aviator-style sunglasses that may or may not fit your face and will not be upset if you lose them, these are the ones. They're rather flimsy, very large for my face, and very dark as far as sunglasses go. But at $12, I'll probably just use them for a hike and leave them there.
customer_reviews.author: Ama Zon

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the first pair (black on black) and within two weeks, the film that keeps the glasses polarized starting lifting on all sides of the glasses causing little bubbles everywhere. I have since re-ordered another pair and hoping they won’t do the same thing. Pro: if you have a smaller face, these are for you!
customer_reviews.author: Alexia Kyriacou

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I really Love these sunglasses! They are classic aviators, stylish, great quality, the lenses are very which is great for me in Sunny Florida! They really help my sensitive eyes! Also, I loved how they aren’t too oversized and loose. I wore These for my trip to Mexico and we did several excursions, one of which was zip lining and I wore these then entire time and they stayed on, it was great! Great price for the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great ray ban dupes
customer_reviews.text: I found these on a ray ban dupes post and they really are so similar to them. They are very comfortable and fit great. They come with a cloth case. For $13 I was nervous to get some lopsided aviators which I find is the case in the store but these were not. I was very surprised with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Merriss

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love these sunglasses! They are lightweight, stylish and I always get compliments. This is my second pair. I still use the first pair I’m looking forward to see if the polarized version compares to more expensive polarized glasses I’ve had in the past. Fingers crossed and I’ll update if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: very excellent inexpensive pair of sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: these are perfect for the cost. they are good looking and fit nicely. I like having them around. They will probably go into the truck so I can wear them when cruising. Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: N. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of sunglasses!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these are extremely nice quality sunglasses. Much better than paying a hundred plus bucks for a pair of Ray-Ban’s. I’m going to buy a few more pairs because these definitely exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Kujala

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% mirrored.
customer_reviews.text: They are a good fit and I like the fabric case they come with. You can see my eyes through them if you are looking at me which I don't like. I was expecting 100% mirror which these are not. I'm not sure if that is a deal breaker though. I might keep them anyway, not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Delta Force

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I lost my last pair so ordering a couple of extras... excellent buy. They’re cool shades, fit good, great sun protection... if you’re on the fence, pull the trigger. Definitely won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo Dooley Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Look Good, Kind of Thin
customer_reviews.text: These are good looking sunglasses and probably what you'd expect for the price. They do a good job of protecting your eyes from the sun, but they are kind of thin and easy to bend, so you have to handle them with care.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Jones

customer_reviews.title: A favorite pair for sure!
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a super cute affordable pair of aviators these are great! I love how these frames are not bulky and do not slide off my face. The lens color is perfect and overall a great pair of sunglasses that are super affordable! Will definitely buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Angie Brown

customer_reviews.title: NIce but DARK
customer_reviews.text: Nice glasses / high quality build, nice bag, fit my face well, etc. etc. these are VERY dark. hard to see even in bright light. Updated 9-28- I guess they needed some getting used to. I was going to return them but now I'm going to keep them. I like them, and use them for driving in bright light conditions.
customer_reviews.author: A guy on LI

customer_reviews.title: Can still see my eyes
customer_reviews.text: so much for mirrored lenses. These are very thin and get dirty easily. I'm just mad at myself for losing a nice pair of mirrored aviators and ordering these to try to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Bronson

customer_reviews.title: Stylish but not protective
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are really cute and stylish but they honestly dont protect your eyes from the sun very much. I still have to use my hand to help shield them from the sun while wearing the sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Fits Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: These glasses fit just like my raybans do. I'd recommend this to men and women. The frames aren't too large and the material is sturdy. If you are looking or a cheaper pair of stylish glasses here you go.
customer_reviews.author: Riley Witvoet

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunglasses for the Money!
customer_reviews.text: They are cheap, but they are light as a feather and actually fit my head comfortably. Typically cheap sunglasses are useless to me. For that price, I should buy a few more as spares.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Postma

customer_reviews.title: Chintzy...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty chintzy sunglasses. I've bought cheaper/higher quality glasses in misc. retail stores or on street corners in NYC. Yes they work as far as blocking the sun to a degree, but theyre not great. Also, they do not cover your eyes as far as transparency goes. Like people can still see your eyes through the lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses for the price!
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are not only lightweight, but they feel durable as well. I love the fact that it actually is polarized and protects my eyes from the sun. I got the all black aviator sunglasses and they are so great for the price! Would highly recommend if you don't want to spend $200 plus on sunglasses just for the name.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Best Aviators I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a lot of pairs of Aviator style sunglasses in my time but these are by far my favorite. I love the color pink but can never find sunglasses either tinted the right shade of pink or that don't have completely see through lenses. These are perfect! As soon as I received them I was a happy buyer. They came very well packaged and their quality is so good that I would never believe they are as affordable as they are. I get so many compliments on them and will easily wear them all summer long. If you are a fan of aviators, these are a must.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Koch

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these bad boys a couple months back for work. I wanted something cheap, stylish and polarized because I work in public safety and didn’t want to worry about scratching or breaking them in a tussle. These have stood up to daily use and work exactly as advertised. I would recommend them to anyone! Excellent purchase and at the price they are a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Trendy and classic
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these sunglasses. At first, I wasn't too sure if they would fit me well but after trying them on, I really like the fit. These aviators are very versatile and I wear them at most occasions. I especially love the fact that the lenses are polarized, to me that is important to help protect my eyes from the sun's glare. They seem to be well built and I hope to get much more use out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Awful all flash
customer_reviews.text: They have nice mirror lens...and that's it haha. Not uv. No shade protective lens from sun and or bright lights. People can easily see your eyes. Just flashy not quality.
customer_reviews.author: Leanna

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I just received these so I can’t comment on how they will last/perform but they are very lightweight, look very nice, and came carefully packaged with cleaning cloth and everything! And for them to be polarized at this price point is incredible!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice! For the price!
customer_reviews.text: Okay! These glasses are just okay! Nothing special! I needed some cheap sunglasses and these fit the bill! My only complaint is that the glasses have a gold frame! I really wanted them in silver! Whatever!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Crain aka Cain

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pink sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Perfect match to most of my floral printed clothes! They are very lightweight and feel like nothing when being worn. They have great sun protection and are comparable to sunglasses that cost $150+. They are extremely affordable and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Holly S

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Love this product so much!!! I never like to spend too much on sunglasses but I worry about the quality when I order sunglasses for less of a price, but these are so worth it! I will definitely be getting more pairs from them! They protect my eyes so well, have great coloring, and lasted me very well on my road trip to Arizona. love this company and product!
customer_reviews.author: Anny

customer_reviews.title: Short term use
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I’ve ordered these 3x because I do like the fit and product, but they are so cheap the black on the lens starts to come off within a couple months of usage ... :(
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: These are good for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are good for the price. The frame seems a little flimsy but unless you're using them as safety glasses or abusing them, they should be fine. I was looking for silver frame/black lens but I actually do like the black frames. The polarization works well for blocking the glare.
customer_reviews.author: Mat Scott

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: They look nice enough, but they are flimsy, the lens keeps falling out (the right lens fell out four times in the first two hours). They were cheap so I shouldn't complain about cheap quality.
customer_reviews.author: Erik R

customer_reviews.title: Great look, great value
customer_reviews.text: love these glasses! They look great, and work great. I have 2 toddlers so with these I don't have to worry if something happened to them - even though I would be really sad because these are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Wife, mom, and adventurer

customer_reviews.title: Best polarized avitors
customer_reviews.text: Best polarized aviators I’ve found so far. The nose cushions are soft and grippy. The metal frame is much better than the plastic stuff you see in Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Very little sun protection
customer_reviews.text: Great looking sunglasses. I wish they would block the sun out though. I work outside on a flight line and these provide very little protection, but are okay for driving.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Cheap is cheap... I guess...
customer_reviews.text: I would not spend my money on these sunglasses again. The quality is subpar. I'm awarding 2 stars rather than 1 because the product wasn't misrepresented-- it's just that for a couple more dollars you can get much better quality than these.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Lee

customer_reviews.title: Aviator with flair
customer_reviews.text: I love that these glasses are polarized and so affordable. This style is a good size for my face. Again, I always rave about the lightweight sunglass, it makes it feel like I’m basically not wearing anything. Love the green color, I wear these a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Fyreffghtr

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: these feel solid and look fine. for the price, they are a great deal! however, they are still cheap aviators, so don't go expecting too much out of them, but they are a nice pair to have for things where you need them, but worry about losing them.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandr

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of these! They fit great. Decent sun exposure protection but definitely wouldn’t rely on these if that is your main concern. I got them for looks.

customer_reviews.title: These glasses r soo bad ass!
customer_reviews.text: Omg!! These glasses r soo bad ass!! Thx a milli for the order! Love em. N love how they were packaged to. Perfect!! 😉😉💯%!
customer_reviews.author: Derek Lee 4~20

customer_reviews.title: Work great and look cute
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t sure about these because they were blue but they work fabulously and have looked cute in all my pictures. Will probably buy another pair soon as mine always break or go missing.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Trottier

product_meta.title: SOJOS Classic Aviator Polarized Sunglasses Mirrored UV400 Lens SJ1054
feature_bullets: HIGH-DEFINITION UV400 TAC POLARIZED LENSES – SojoS's HD TAC polarized lenses can filter out sunlight reflected glare, and protect your eyes from long-term damage by blocking 100% of harmful UVA and UVB rays.

HIGH-QUALITY MATERIALS – These SojoS classic aviator sunglasses are made of unbreakable metal frames, colorful flash mirrored reflective UV400 lenses, solid metal hinges, all the details ensuring you a long time using. These retro sunglasses are suitable for both men and women and suitable for any climate and weather conditions.

PERFECT ALL ROUNDER – These SojoS sunglasses are the perfect choice for outdoor sports and activities such as taking selfies, cycling, driving, shopping, traveling, hiking, and are suitable as a high fashion accessory and daily wear all year round.
PRODUCT DIMENSION – Lens Width: 58mm(2.28inches) | Lens Height: 50mm(1.97inches) | Temple Length: 140mm(5.51inches) | Nose Bridge: 17mm(0.67inches).

GIFT IDEAS PACKAGE – Sunglasses*1, microfiber pouch*1, microfiber glasses cleaning cloth*1, glasses box*1. It is also a gift packaged ready, making it a wonderful yet practical gift idea for friends and family!
